game

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Screen
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LevelScreen

    public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Screen, which can be created, updated and drawn.
    Version:
    1.0, May 22 2014., 1.1, June 8 2014. (JavaDoc), 1.2, June 10 2014. (JavaDoc)
    Author:
    baseball435 of Youtube, Anqi Wu (JavaDoc)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Screen(ScreenFactory screenFactory)
      Constructs a new Screen with the given ScreenFactory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScreenFactory getScreenFactory()
      Returns the ScreenFactory of this screen.
      abstract void onCreate()
      Does nothing on creation.
      abstract void onDraw(java.awt.Graphics2D twoDimensional)
      Draws nothing.
      abstract void onUpdate()
      Does nothing when updating.

      • Screen

        public Screen(ScreenFactory screenFactory)
        Constructs a new Screen with the given ScreenFactory.

        screenFactory - - ScreenFactory - The ScreenFactory that displays this screen.

        public abstract void onCreate()

        public abstract void onDraw(java.awt.Graphics2D twoDimensional)
        Draws nothing. Override to draw something.
        Parameters:
        twoDimensional - - Graphics2D - The Graphics2D object.

      • getScreenFactory

        public ScreenFactory getScreenFactory()
        Returns the ScreenFactory of this screen.
        Returns:
        The ScreenFactory object that is associated with this screen.
